DataElement.preferredDefinition: Records a response to indicate if a report that provides a description of the gross and microscopic examination of the specimen and is used to make a diagnosis and to determine treatment is available.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A report that provides a description of the gross and microscopic examination of the specimen and is used to make a diagnosis and to determine treatment. It defines which structures and organs of the body are involved by the tumor, verifies the primary site of the cancer and describes the extent to which it has spread._The quality of being obtainable or accessible and ready for use or service.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A pathology report provides a description of the gross and microscopic examination of the specimen and is used to make a diagnosis and to determine treatment. Report defines which structures and organs of the body are involved by the tumor, verifies the primary site of the cancer and describes the extent to which it has spread. Essential information to be included in a pathology report: the date and name of the report, slide number, the source of the specimen, the primary tumor size, he histologic diagnosis including the grade or degree of differentiation, the extent of disease within and beyond the primary site.

Concepts.definition: A report that provides a description of the gross and microscopic examination of the specimen and is used to make a diagnosis and to determine treatment. It defines which structures and organs of the body are involved by the tumor, verifies the primary site of the cancer and describes the extent to which it has spread.

Property.preferredDefinition: Available; obtainable or accessible and ready for use or service.

Concepts.definition: The quality of being obtainable or accessible and ready for use or service.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Unknown Refused Not Applicable Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Records the yes, no, unknown, refused,  or not applicable responses to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: To decline to do, accept, give, or allow something.

Concepts.definition: To decline to do, accept, give, or allow something.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2023.8.15 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0002731. ak

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Unknown Refuse Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.:Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.:To decline to do, accept, give, or allow something.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.
To decline to do, accept, give, or allow something.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 6/19/2020 jk released for reuse by NRG. 2017-02-27: These changes do not negatively impact the CDEs using this VD.  Remove "code" as a rep term qualifier.  Added "unknown" and "refused" as rep term qualifiers. Changed the long name and definition. Changed the conceptual domain from UML Model.  Added a max length.  Added PVs
